ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson chuckles, as he gently holds Elita. Well, I do know a few things about Rodimus, in his younger years, even before I became a Prime.  Before I was

Tucson chuckles, as he gently holds Elita.

"Well, I do know a few things a=
bout Rodimus, in his younger years, even before I became a Prime.  Before I=
 was rendered blind, we'd do many missions side by side.  Of course, him be=
ing Hot Rod, a sports vehcile and me, an average compact SUV, off roading v=
ehicle, with no interest in speed, we'd often kid each other about speed ve=
rsus rugged durability over off road terrain.  One day, we were driving tow=
ard a mission to stop Galvatron's path of destruction, when our path got bl=
asted by unknown enemy fire.  We knew we couldn't let a rock slide stop us,=
 and we didn't.  I knew I could've just drove over it, and gotten to the ot=
her side with no problem. But Rodimus wasn't built for that in his alt form=
.  We never left each other's side that day.  We found a way to get around =
that obsticle together, even though we had conflicting ideas on how to do i=
t, but, eventually we did compromise and we thwarted Galvatron with the aid=
 of the other Autobots.  Sometimes opposites work well together, and Rodimu=
s proved it that day.  I guess that's what drove me to rescue him. I couldn=
't think of how I would manage, if I had not had him by my side."

He gentl=
y rubs Elita's shoulders.

"I wish I could remember what happened to Bumble=
bee and Spike, and Kremzeem, but after I was rendered off line for several =
vorns, I lost a good portion of my memory. "

Like Rodimus, Tucson's gentil=
e embrace takes on a paternal aspect. He holds Elita as if she were his own=
.

" And don't you worry about your mother, Stanton will find a way to brin=
g her back, I'm sure of it.  But you also have to keep that hope alive in y=
our heart.  The more hope, the more chances of her healing."

Tucson was no=
w swapping his status to a more parental role.  It felt good to be with Eli=
ta, and right at this moment, he wasn't about to trade that joy with anythi=
ng else.
